definition[0]: a product such as a record, book, or toy that is related to a new film, TV show etc
definition[1]: a product such as a record, book, or toy that is connected with a new film, TV show etc
example[0]: Many of the books in the bestseller lists are TV tie-ins.
definition[2]: a way of PROMOTING (=attracting peopleâ€™s attention to) a new film, TV show etc by connecting it with something such as a free gift or well-known product
example[1]: The movie has no marketing tie-ins with fast-food restaurants.
